mapper.select: SELECT A.company_id, A.company_name, A.company_abbreviation, A.province_code, B.region_name AS province_name, A.city_code, IFNULL(C.region_name, CONCAT(B.region_name, '市')) AS city_name, A.district_code, D.region_name AS district_name, A.address, A.contacts, A.cellphone, A.business_license, A.brand, A.memo FROM shangshufang_customer.company A INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.china_region B ON A.province_code = B.region_code LEFT JOIN shangshufang_base.china_region C ON A.city_code = C.region_code INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.china_region D ON A.district_code = D.region_code WHERE A.data_status = 'A' ORDER BY A.update_time DESC;

SELECT A.company_id, A.company_name, A.company_abbreviation, A.province_code, B.region_name AS province_name, A.city_code, IFNULL(C.region_name, CONCAT(B.region_name, '市')) AS city_name, A.district_code, D.region_name AS district_name, A.address, A.contacts, A.cellphone, A.business_license, A.brand, A.memo, A.data_status, CASE WHEN A.data_status = 'P' THEN '未激活' WHEN A.data_status = 'A' THEN '正常' WHEN A.data_status = 'D' THEN '冻结' ELSE '未知数据状态' END AS data_status_text, E.admin_name AS create_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, F.admin_name AS update_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM shangshufang_customer.company A INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.china_region B ON A.province_code = B.region_code INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.china_region C ON A.city_code = C.region_code INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.china_region D ON A.district_code = D.region_code INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.system_admin E ON A.create_user = E.admin_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.system_admin F ON A.update_user = F.admin_id WHERE A.company_id = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER};
SELECT COUNT(1) AS TotalCount FROM shangshufang_customer.company WHERE company_name = #{arg0,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
SELECT COUNT(1) AS TotalCount FROM shangshufang_customer.company WHERE cellphone = #{arg0,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

mapper.update: UPDATE shangshufang_customer.company SET company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_abbreviation = #{companyAbbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, district_code = #{districtCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_license = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE company_id = #{companyID,jdbcType=INTEGER};
